org.w3c.dom.css
Interface CSS2CounterReset

All Superinterfaces:
CSSValue
public interface CSS2CounterReset
extends CSSValue

The CSS2CounterReset interface represents a simple value for the counter-reset CSS Level 2 property.

Since:
DOM Level 2
